epp:phrases.epp:phrase: The title of the item. The title should not end with a full stop, but may end with a question mark. There is no way to make italic text, please enter it normally. If you have a subtitle, it should be preceded with a colon [:]. Use capitals only for the first word and for proper nouns.
A summary of the items content. If the item has a formal abstract then that is what should be entered here. No complicated text formatting is possible.
